item.title: Doing Paris like a local
item.description:
Doing Paris like a local

Before Airbnb became popular, there was a service I used in Paris and still use to this day: ParisAutrement.com. They rent apartments exclusively in the Marais area of Paris (3rd and 4th arrondissements) and I've never had a bad experience with them.

item.title: Beyond the Arctic Circle
item.description:
Beyond the Arctic Circle

It was Nunavut Day in Canada this past week, the anniversary of when the Parliament of Canada passed the Nunavut act and established the territory of Nunavut.
